thread.title: Memorial to slain social worker catches fire
thread.title_full: Memorial to slain social worker catches fire - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Memorial to slain social worker catches fire
text:
BARRE, Vt. - A floral memorial for slain DCF worker Lara Sobel outside the state offices in Barre burned overnight.
The community expressed grief, honoring Sobel's memory with a growing display of flowers.
The city police and fire departments are investigating, but they say the fire might have been sparked by the lit candles in the memorial.
Officials suggest electric candles as a safer way to pay respects.
